A time machine that takes you back to a specific moment in time, allowing you to change your past actions and see the consequences of those changes.
A virtual reality experience thatts you in a different time period, allowing you to explore and interact with people and events from history.
A mobile app that uses augmented reality to show you what the world would look like if time ran backwards, allowing you to see the effects of gravity and movement in a completely different way.
A clock that uses quantum mechanics to slow down time, allowing you to experience longer periods of time and see the effects of aging and decay in a more pronounced way.
A device that uses artificial intelligence to predict the future, allowing you to see the consequences of your actions and make better decisions in the present.
